pageContext.claim: “DACA has been made increasingly difficult by the fact that Cryin’ Chuck Schumer took such a beating over the shutdown that he is unable to act on immigration!”
pageContext.analysis: This is an exaggeration. Democrats, specifically Chuck Schumer, came to Trump with a bipartisan plan that had been crafted in the Senate to fix DACA, or Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals, which would have averted a shutdown. Schumer reportedly also offered funding for the border wall in an effort to reopen the government, which Trump refused.
